Title: A Great Turnabout for Goku?! Super Shenron, Come Out Right Now!
Writer: Katsuyuki Sumizawa, Hiroshi Toda, Akira Toriyama
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Ryûsei Nakao
Plot: Goku and his body are reunited, but the noble Saiyan is severely injured and unable to fight. A Namekian messenger rushes to assist Gohan and Krillin in summoning Shenron, but there's no guarantee he'll arrive before Frieza.
